QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Response Query With Constituent
QueryViewSpec.Description: Rate Increase response data joins to Constituent
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select srs.ID , c.LOOKUPID as SponsorID , sc.LOOKUPID as SponsorshipCommitmentID , srs.REVENUELOOKUPID , srs.CHANGEYEAR , srs.INCREASERATE , srs.RESPONSEDATE , srs.RESPONDAFTERRATECHANGEUPDATED , srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT , srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT , (select dbo.USR_RESPONSE_AFTER_RATECHANGE_IMPLEMENTED_CODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_RESPONSE_AFTER_RATECHANGE_IMPLEMENTED_CODE where ID = srs.RESPONSEIFAFTERRATECHANGEIMPLEMENTEDCODEID) as RESPONSEIFAFTERIMPLEMENTATIONDESCRIPTION , srs.NOAPPEALRESPONSEDATE , (select dbo.USR_NO_RATEINCREASEAPPEAL_RESPONSECODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_NO_RATEINCREASEAPPEAL_RESPONSECODE where ID = srs.NOAPPEALRESPONSECODEID) as NOAPPEALRESPONSEDESCRIPTION , srs.SPONSORID as CONSTITUENTID , srs.SPONSORSHIPID from dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS srs join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = srs.SPONSORID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.ID = srs.SPONSORSHIPID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID
